Build susceptible-balance inputs from a panel

Source: R/modelling-odin2-panel-adapter.R
odin2_balance_inputs_from_panel.Rd

Convenience helper to construct inputs= for the discrete-time susceptible balance odin2 model (model = "balance_discrete").

Usage

odin2_balance_inputs_from_panel(
  panel,
  times,
  iso3,
  year_col = "year",
  births_col = "births",
  coverage_col = "coverage",
  cases_col = "cases",
  ve = 1
)

Arguments

panel

Panel data.frame/tibble containing at least iso3, year, births, coverage, and cases columns (configurable via *_col).

times

Numeric/integer vector of times (typically years) to align to.

iso3

ISO3 code to filter panel.

year_col

Year column.

births_col

Births column.

coverage_col

Coverage column on the interval [0, 1]; values outside are clamped. (Coverage values are bounded to the interval [0, 1].)

cases_col

Cases column.

ve

Vaccine effectiveness multiplier applied to coverage when computing vaccinated births (vaccinated = births * coverage * ve).

Value

Named list with numeric vectors births, vaccinated, cases, each of length length(times).

Details

This function does not require {odin2} or {dust2}.
